mapper.sql: t.id as id , t.temp_no as tempNo , t.sms_type as smsType , t.name as name , t.sign_name as signName , t.content as content , t.route_type as routeType , t.pro_no as proNo , t.type as type , t.use_time_type as useTimeType , t.work_interval as workInterval , t.holiday_interval as holidayInterval , t.apply_name as applyName , t.apply_url as applyUrl , t.apply_reason as applyReason , t.tenant_id as tenantId , t.status as status , t.create_time as createTime , t.create_by as createBy , t.update_time as updateTime , t.update_by as updateBy , t.remark as remark
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_sms_template
id,
temp_no,
sms_type,
name,
sign_name,
content,
route_type,
pro_no,
type,
use_time_type,
work_interval,
holiday_interval,
apply_name,
apply_url,
apply_reason,
tenant_id,
status,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
remark,
#{id},
#{tempNo},
#{smsType},
#{name},
#{signName},
#{content},
#{routeType},
#{proNo},
#{type},
#{useTimeType},
#{workInterval},
#{holidayInterval},
#{applyName},
#{applyUrl},
#{applyReason},
#{tenantId},
#{status},
#{createTime},
#{createBy},
#{updateTime},
#{updateBy},
#{remark},
mapper.update:
update t_sys_sms_template
temp_no = #{tempNo},
sms_type = #{smsType},
name = #{name},
sign_name = #{signName},
content = #{content},
route_type = #{routeType},
pro_no = #{proNo},
type = #{type},
use_time_type = #{useTimeType},
work_interval = #{workInterval},
holiday_interval = #{holidayInterval},
apply_name = #{applyName},
apply_url = #{applyUrl},
apply_reason = #{applyReason},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_sys_sms_template t where t.id=#{id}
select from t_sys_sms_template t where t.temp_no = #{tempNo}
